title: Bug 23935 - Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both widgets are children of the shell. The issue only occurs on Windows. To work around this issue, we can create the text editor as a sibling of the tree and move it above the tree.
OB: When clicking anywhere in the tree, the tree gains focus and the text widget does not lose focus.
EB: The text widget should lose focus when clicking anywhere in the tree.
SR: Ensure that clicking anywhere in the tree causes the text widget to lose focus.
